page.title: 05The Autumn Show
page.content:
The{Autumn Show}consists of a competition that is held once every year in{September. You get a pamphet with the details in and what you can enter. There are different things for different age groups,you can enter a lot of things like{cooking,art,needle work}and {models. { { }There are a lot more things which you can do.It costs 5p for a child to enter and 10p for an adult.
You can get money if you win first, second and third prizes. There are about 4 things for each subject so if you get the most points over all for your subject{you win a cup.
